title: The true copy of a letter sent from Portsmouth by George Guillims to Mr. Robert VVhitney dwelling in Herefordshire; and intercepted amongst others by some of the Parliaments troops: vvhereby it doth plainly appeare that the papists or malignant party, doe seeke out all wayes and meanes to work the ruine and destruction of the Protestants.
author: Guillims, George.
